org.swisscheese.swisscheese.settings

Class GameSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.swisscheese.swisscheese.settings.GameSettings

  • public class GameSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a game settings object class that contains settings of the game that are used when the game is loaded from the StartMenu.

    A GameSettings object can be serialized and deserialized to save the preferences.

    The constructors of GameSettings are overloaded in a way that makes it easy to have multiple windows where the GameSettings can change. If there will be more fields for GameSettings, a builder class can be made in the future.

    Since:
    2018-12-26, v0.5
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    Alex Kalinins

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameSettings

        @Deprecated
public GameSettings()
        Deprecated. 
        A no-args constructor for GSON serialization and deserialization.

      • GameSettings

        public GameSettings(WindowSize windowSize,
                    boolean fitToScreen,
                    float FOV,
                    TexturePack texturePack,
                    int... useless)
        Regular constructor of GameSettings
        Parameters:
        windowSize - window size enum of the game.
        fitToScreen - if the game will fit the user screen
        FOV - the field of view of the user. Recommended Value: -0.5 to -1.5
        useless - useless variable to avoid ambigous constructor.
        texturePack - the texture pack the game will use.

      • GameSettings

        public GameSettings(WindowSize windowSize,
                    boolean fitToScreen,
                    float FOV,
                    GameSettings existing)
        Constructor from existing GameSettings and windowSize and fitToScreen. This constructor would be used by the SettingsPanel panel, since texture-pack selection is done on a different panel.

        Infers texture pack from existing.

        Parameters:
        windowSize - window size enum of the game
        fitToScreen - if the game will fit the user screen
        existing - an existing GameSave

      • GameSettings

        public GameSettings(TexturePack texturePack,
                    GameSettings existing)
        Constructor. Everything but TexturePack is infered from existing.
        Parameters:
        texturePack - texture pack
        existing - existing GameSettings object.
